snippet: The Federal Housing Finance Agency announced the step as part of a package of measures to reduce foreclosures.
abstract: Federal Housing Finance Agency says it will act to cut loan balances for thousands of Freddie Mac and Fannie Mae borrowers who owe more than their homes are worth.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Housing Finance Agency announced the step as part of a package of measures to reduce foreclosures.

headline.main: Thousands of ‘Underwater’ Borrowers to Get Relief
headline.print_headline: Thousands of ‘Underwater’ Home Borrowers to Get Relief

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
